paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant found in the paper, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: long QT syndrome with episodes of ventricular tachycardia and TdP

individual_records.phenotype_details: long QT syndrome, episodes of ventricular tachycardia and TdP
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Postnatal genetic testing confirmed a de novo, heterozygous KCNH2 gene, c.1882G>A p.(Gly628Ser), mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with long QT syndrome and resulted in episodes of ventricular tachycardia.

variants.additional_notes: The patient was treated with magnesium infusion and nadolol.
key_quotes: The QTc measured 640 ms and there were short episodes of both monomorphic VT and TdP without hemodynamic compromise.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the KCNH2 gene was reported in the paper.
